26109550.review: When I first started out playing this game, I wasn't really sure what to think.  Coming across my first few deaths I was reminded of another game I had played where the objective was pretty much just about finding different ways of dying.  I felt like perhaps this game was similar, but there was something nagging at me and telling me I was wrong, so I explored some more.  I did come across a point in the game where I got stuck and couldn't figure out how to progress further, so I had to look up a guide to help me in that particular spot, but after that, the game completely evolved into something entirely new and fun.  I became completely and utterly enraptured by the beautiful story, and by the end of the game, I just felt happy.  It was a wonderful experience, and I'm glad I didn't just write it off in the beginning like I almost did.  I highly, highly recommend this game!

26092130.review:
Disturbed - минималистическая зарисовка на тему перманентной смерти. Простенькая, даже примитивная визуальная новелла, которая своей концепцией нагоняет тоску. В хорошем смысле.

Вся игра вместе с ачивками проходится за час. К сожалению, методом простого перебора можно и пройти игру, и открыть почти все ачивменты. Сама история примитивна, хотя можно было постараться и придумать что-нибудь поинтереснее. Хотя бы банально описать причины местной "чумы". Но игра невероятно пуста. Эта пустота своего рода компонент местной атмосферы. Несмотря на бедность игры во всех аспектах, игра все-таки создает некую атмосферу бесыходности и фатализма. Единственное, что единорог на фоне местного ангста смотрится как-то неуместно...

Может создаться впечатление, что это игра - очередной проходняк, который не заслуживает ни снисхождения, ни внимания. Так и было бы, если бы не одно "но". Данная игра бесплатна, в то время как множество бездарных инди требуют за себя деньги. Да, порой небольших (а порой все-таки больших), но денег. Здесь же автор, не кривя душой, просто выложил свое произведение в свободный доступ. С этой позиции, мне видится все это так, будто человек просто поделился своим творчеством, не прося ничего взамен. Поэтому у меня нет ни малейшего повода и желания как-то принижать заслуги творца и создателя этой игры.

Я рекомендую поиграть в нее, если вам близок дух безысходности, тоски, скорби и фатализма. Все это выполнено в стилистике минимализма (кто-то скажет, что автор особо не парился и нарисовал все от руки - тоже будет по-своему прав), что особо не задевает, учитывая скромность всей игры. ВН длится, как я уже говорил, один час. Если поздним вечером у вас соответстующий настрой и свободное время, я рекомендую попробовать.

26090856.review:
Disturbed is a Free2play adventure indie game with a dark but cool art style. It is single player and rather casual, as it only takes around one hour to complete with all achievements. 

Story
Disturbed throws you in a World which fades into darkness. You are a farmer, trying to find out where the disease that corrupts the land comes from, so you leave your farm and head out. Overall a good story as the World really drags you into it. I did not identify with the character, even though I was making all choices for him.

Gameplay
The gameplay of Disturbed is rather old-school. You get a nicely drawn picture, some text, describing what happened and some choices to make. Often a choice will kill you and you will have to reload a save and choose the other option, but you will get an achievement every time you die because of something else, also was I curious how exactly I was going to die, so I died plenty of times. Do not fear that you will have to read, as it is not described to briefly, but sufficient. Per Place you go to you will not have to read anything bigger than this paragraph.

Graphics
Well Graphics… The game did not have the usual graphics, neither did it have any animations, but this is part of the experience and why this is this unique. As already said all you get are pictures, but even a potato could run the game. 

Do I Recommend?
Yes. The game is short and may be boring if you do not like games of this type, but look through the screenshots up above in the description you should give it a try, as it is for free and fast to download. I enjoyed it.

26089846.review:
Потревоженный - довольно интересный текстовый квест, и по совместительству адовый симулятор геймовера, ибо вариантов смерти главного героя здесь уйма.

1) [u]Сюжет[/u]: во времена чумы одинокий фермер пускается в путешествие дабы спасти свою ферму от разложения. Вот только в пути ему встретятся множество опасностей, и найдет ли наш герой свою смерть [spoiler](почти все ачивки ;)[/spoiler], или же спасет не только свою ферму, но и весь мир, зависит от нашего выбора. История в игре довольно мрачная, до конца не раскрытая, но все же интересная. Отдельно хочу сказать что если будете играть в русском варианте, имейте ввиду что корректура здесь плохенькая, и русский текст перемежается с непереведенным английским.

2) [u]Геймплей[/u]: когда-то давным давно когда мониторы были ламповые, а компьютеры большими был такой жанр игр - текстовый квест, этакая предтеча современных визуальных новелл. Так вот эта игра  ближе к оному квесту, ибо все комманды текстовые, а текст не линейный, а вариативный, то есть можно (и нужно) перепроходить одни и те же локации, по многу раз, а не как в стандартной визуальное новелле, сделал выбор - вернуться назад нельзя. Игра короткая, всю её со всеми ачивками можно пройти за час.

3) [u]Графика и звуки[/u]: картинка отрисована ручкой на бумаге, и имеет очень интересный и мрачный стиль. Музыки кроме редких фоновых шумов, и звуков арфы особо нет.

[u]Как итог[/u]: хороший и интересный хоррор в полузабытом ныне жанре текстового квеста. Любителям мрачных историй рекомендую!
8 единорогов из 10.

26081409.review:
So the game is very much like the old choose your own adventure books. Prepared to be a bit frustrated at first. However as you go on and get into the game the frustration begins to lessen. I'm honestly not patient when it comes to puzzle games, but the puzzles were a nice level of difficultly for someone who isn't a master yet, but has played them before. None of the answers were completely bizarre and I felt a sense of accomplishment when I figured the puzzles out, rather than relief like some games.

The art style is wonderful. The artist does care about the detail in the images and while anatomy might not be the strongest aspect at this point, the little things added in make all the difference and make the pictures fun. 

I do think that perhaps a puzzle or two could be added at the start, since that felt very much more like a death trap at every turn as can pose a bit of an issue to get people into the game. Additionally there are more sounds that could stand to be added to the game, but for a free game I really got quite a bit.

In the end, it was a fun little game that changed from frustrating into rewarding and is a nice, quick game to play. Especially as we head towards Halloween.

26057975.review:
Наткнулся на эту игрушку в популярных новинках Стима. Ну, а поскольку я поклонник визуальных новелл, то я сразу же ее установил и начал играть, ибо сразу был понятно, что она не будет слишком длинной. Так и оказалось.

Эту историю я прошел (со всеми достижениями) за полтора часа. Могу ответственно заявить, что эта игра более чем достойная. Как оказалось, это не совсем визуальная новелла (хотя, движок у этой игры именно такой, как в визуальных новеллах). Это скорее квест, который лишь принял форму визуальной новеллы. Таким образом это больше игра, чем история.

Практически каждое действие игрока имеет последствия, которые определят концовку этой истории (в большинстве случаев - это мучительная смерть протагониста). И на каждую такую концовку предусмотренно достижение, что не может не радовать. Следует отметить, что в игре всего одна хорошая концовка, одна нейтральная, а остальные пятнадцать - это безвременная кончина протагониста.

Как я смею предположить, все сцены отрисованы авторами вручную и это просто прекрасно. Мрачно и чертовски прекрасно!

А теперь конкретика:

Плюсы:
+ Бесплатность. Игра полностью бесплатна, за что хочется перед разработчиками снять шляпу. Спасибо вам!
+ Атмосфера. Благодаря выверенному стилю рисовки и текстам создастся неповторимая, самобытная атмосфера разложения, склизкого страха и безысходности, которая увлекает с головой.
+ Сюжет. Он весьма занимателен и не отпускает пока не будет пройдена основная сюжетная линия.

Нейтрально:
+/- Некоторая невнятность. Даже после полного прохождения мы так и не узнаем всех причин произошедшего, остается некоторая недоказанность. Хорошо это или плохо - сложно сказать.

Минусы:
- Музыка. Ее практически нет (только в меню). Хотя, на мой взгляд, подходящая музыка этой игре только бы на пользу пошла и углубила бы и без того достойную атмосферу.
- Звуки. Они весьма скудны и невнятны.

Итак, оценки:
1. Игровой процесс: 7/10
2. Сюжет: 7/10
3. Атмосфера: 9/10
4. Визуальное оформление 8/10
_____________
Итого: 7,5/10

P.S. Перевод весьма неплох, даже литературен, за что переводчикам отдельное спасибо. Но в виду каких-то неведомых причин порядка десятка фраз/надписей так и остались непереведенными.

26049967.review:
Ваш герой — отчаявшийся фермер, чьи угодья поразила загадочная Чума. Теперь здесь нет ни урожая, ни скота, словом, ничего, чем раньше кипела жизнь. Вы — единственное разумное существо в этом погибающем мире. Или же нет?
После прогулки по потерявшим краски просторам становится ясно: всё куда загадочнее, чем Вы думали. И дело не в эпидемии, здесь есть нечто большее. Чтобы узнать, что стало причиной угасания жизни на этой земле, нужно обойти все владения (и не один раз), встретить новых (и старых) жильцов, облюбовавших тленные земли, а также решить несколько загадок, стоящих на Вашем пути к поиску счастливого финала. 
И помните: сон — совсем не лучшее решение проблемы.

26048073.review:
Gra jest ciekawym doświadczeniem dla fanów horrorów i zgniłego klimatu. 
Gameplay jest dosyć ubogi- całość sprowadza się do podejmowania decyzji, rozwiązywania od czasu do czasu prostych zagadek. Bardzo dużo decyzji może cię zabić- problem w tym, że o ile niektóre sposoby śmierci są faktycznie logicznie uzasadnione (głupia decyzja, jak np zejście do studni) to inne są po prostu zgadywanką- iść w prawo, lewo czy w środek (jedna z decyzji jest śmiertelna). Duży plus dla twórców za osiągnięcia- po każdym dead endzie dostajemy humorystyczne osiągnięcie, czasami z nawiązaniem do innych dzieł.
Oprawa graficzna jest bardzo ładna- całość to rysunki, nie spodziewajcie się niczego innego, niż na screenach. Bardzo dobrze oddają one klimat zaszczucia i zgnilizny, dlatego fani takich klimatów powinni być zadowoleni.
Dźwięk... cóż, gra jest cicha. Nie licząc okazjonalnych odgłosów kroków, drzwi czy śmierci bohatera, nie uświadczymy żadnej muzyki (chyba, że w głównym menu).
Ogólnie gra jest w porządku, jako smaczek lub inne doświadczenie- polecam. Można wczuć się w klimat, czasami przestraszyć, grafiki dobrze oddają to co się dzeje na ekranie. W dodatku gra jest za darmo, więc czemu nie spróbować? Warto jej poświęcić trochę czasu.

26040340.review:
Realmente sorprende esta clase de "Mini-Aventuras"...

===============Critica Con Spoilers================
Historia: Eres un Granjero con una vida comun y corriente, un dia despiertas y ves que todo esta hecho una basura, al observar que todo esta extramadamente lugubre y extraño, tomas la decision de emprender un viaje y tratar de solucionar todo, a lo largo del reccorido te encuentras con seres extraños del estilo Lovecraft cautivando la atencion, hasta llegar a un castillo subir a lo mas alto y con un final poder destruirlo...

Jugabilidad: Las personas que han jugado aventuras graficas como los de Tellatele Games, se les hara bastante comodo pese a remplazar el escenario grafico por un arte bastante minimalista pero muy expresivo, el juego consiste de decisiones y el 75% de ellas sirven de algo.

Sensaciones: el juego pese a ser una aventura grafica minimalista, destaca bastante en el area de survival horror, recomiendo jugar este juego con cascos y sin nada que interrumpa el juego (a lo "Limbo") es una experiencia bastante corta asi que recomiendo poner el mayor enfasis posible a la hora de jugar al titulo.

Publico: recomiendo para un publico de 13 años en adelante, debido a la forma que se presenta la obra ya que esta puede ser bastante inquietante a ratos.

============================================


virtudes: el juego ofrece una buena ambientacion y diseño minimalista, ademas es gratis!

defectos: la jugabilidad a lo largo va aburrirte el morir y tener que hacer algo una y otra vez como al abrir las compuertas del arbol, el buscar la espada, el matar el jodido mal, el perro, entre otras cosas y para eso se pone una solucion que es buena y mala la vez, que es el cargar cuando quieras y esto te saca de la dinamica de juego aparte de borrar la atencion en mas de una oportunidad, llegando a ser repetitiva y tediosa en algunas ocaciones al borde de llegar y presionar "Salteado Rapido" para evadir el texto, lo cual termina sacando el contexto del juego.



conclusion: es un buen titulo gratis que esta enfocado en un publico paciente, con una buena historia y con una jugabilidad bastante decente, ademas de ir de la mano con un arte minimalista muy bien cuidad, por desgracia la jugabiladad a la larga a la mayoria de publico le aburrira a la larga por hacer la misma cosa una y otra vez (es obvio que es tedioso) pero por lo demas cumple con todo lo que promete.

Puntaje Final: 9

Gracias por leer mi analisis.

26021725.review:
Disturbed is a choose-your-own path adventure game.  It's a short story of a farmer who decides to set out to find the reason for a disturbing evil which has enveloped the land.  It's told with text dialouge which is progressed with choice selections, and is supported by scenes of hand drawn sketches.  

Although it was a reletavely short game, I throughly enjoyed exploring the possibilities it presented, and completing it.  So if you have an hour or two to kill, and like adventure games, then maybe it's time to find out if you'll like this game too!

Thanks for the experience, Brad!  Good job, and good luck!

9/10

26014381.review:
This was my first ever text adventure game, and it was...an experience. Sound effects were cool, the artwork is pretty cool too. The idea itself is neat, but honestly didn't think it was executed as well as it could have been. This game hasn't put me off text adventures, but I'll certainly look into any future games more than jumping at the sight of 'free'. If you got a few hours to kill, it's good for that.

Reasons why I'm not a fan
[list]
[*] I think all but a few choices were literally a 50/50 choice resulting in death. Felt like a death simulator for a while
[*] Too much backtracking for my tastes - a to b to c to a to b to a to b to a to b to c to b is not fun for me
[*] Few scenes had much more potential than being irrelevant, dragged out fillers or purely for inevitable death.
[/list]

[spoiler] I expected more use out of the knife, like being able to kill the fish or the dog properly, than just being able to cut really thick vines pulling the life out of me.. it's only purpose. [/spoiler]

25984802.review:
Short story, point-and-click type of adventure with a rather dark and slightly twisted Choose Your Adventure style presentation.  Most paths will kill you, and the words, "Your adventure ends here," will become writ in stone before you find certain clues that guide positive progress.

For those who seek achievements, there is a fantastic guide that will get you through the game in about 35 minutes (my estimation, based on choices that took me a bit to re-figure after "ending my adventure here" so often).

For an indie game from an unknown dev, this is an easy, easy thumb up to Brad Moore, and for a point & click game, I rate it thumb up as well.  While it's not animated and glittery, it's one of those honest little games that fills a niche for storytelling fans and those looking for an interesting diversion.

Finally, seeing what the achievements are really for was amusing in the manner of, "OMG I can die *that* way, too??"

Props, Brad - this is a nice diversion at a bargain price.

25982520.review:
Este es el tipo de juego en el que la premisa es "muere, muere hasta que aprendas cómo sobrevivir". Y es que morir es muy fácil en "Disturbed", aunque estés en lo que creas que es el camino adecuado. Hay veces en que, con un par de elecciones, ya mueres, mientras que en otras te llevará veinte o más.

No es una historia muy compleja, pero sí entretenida en cuando comienzas a ver cómo es en realidad la cosa. La mayor dificultad aquí es descubrir cómo lograr ganar el juego sin morir, por lo que recomiendo se aproveche la gran cantidad de ranuras de guardado que hay.

Es un juego simple, corto, de esos que te pasas en una o dos horas, con dibujos sencillos en blanco y negro, a mano. ¿Recomendado? Sí.

25973533.review:
The game was fun for how long it lasted, but is not amongst the most memorable of games.

The art and music are bland, but fit the mood quite well in my opinion.
However, the quality of the art ranges from being very on point to being rather underwhelming, which is disappointing, seeing how the creator could clearly do much better, as proven by the few very well drawn scenes.

The writing is fine, but could be more... colourful.
I'd rate it about average.

About the deaths:
(SPOILERS AHEAD!)
I'll use the achievement names for the deaths.
Most of them are pretty good, as they are clearly avoidable. Two of them are not, but... I'd consider them alright nonetheless.
The absolute highlight in my opinion is "don't need a fishing permit", as it is only avoidable by logic if you read everything carefully up to that point.

However, there are three deaths I did not like at all, as they were in theory avoidable, but the player was not given the opportunity to do so. Instead, the choice was made for the player or the player was missing a crucial choice (go back)
The deaths are:
-who's a good boy?
-Got roped by a Roper!
-Sam doesn't save you in this story.

Had those been done differently, for instance by adding additional choices, then I would not have anything to complain about as far as deaths go, except for a single, random death.
"Nature will rise against you!", namely. This one was completely random and thus not very good. It was rather amusing at the very least.

All in all I'd say the game is okay. I can recommend it as you don't pay anything for it, but that's it, basically.
If the creator of this game only made it to receive feedback, then I would say it's a solid start.

25969262.review:
Pretty decent visual novel. Its not that good, but it isnt bad either. 

You are a farmer which leaves his house and failed crops in order to investigate plague that is spread across the land. Story was pretty interesting and mysterious at start, and later on it builds up to a searching game where you'll look for items to progress through story. However, i wish it explained little more about the end of the story, as it feels like something is missing.

I like how the game lets you explore the parts which will kill you, for example trying to fight a bear with small rocks. Each unique death also rewards you with achievement which makes them even more interesting to find.

Pros:
- Unique black and white art, which fits well with creepy story
- Story isnt that bad, and was pretty mysterious at start
- Easy to 100%
- Low system requirements
- Alot of save slots (more than 10 but i dont think you'll need that many)

Neutral:
- Although its a visual novel, it would be interesting if instead of clicking the sentences we could click on objects we want to interact with. However this does would require more development.
- It could use some puzzles to do along the way to make it little more interesting

Cons:
- Even though story is nice, i would like if it had more backstory

Dette er et ganske skummelt spill for de som ikke er vandt til dette. Selv om det er ganske enkle lydeffekter i spillet, kan det være at et bilde av en død dame, et dyr som biter på deg eller til og med et skjellet håpper fram uten advarsel. Du kan sitte flere timer foran dette spillet, siden du må virkelig tenke for å finne ut hva du burde gjørde. Du kommer til å havne på en del dead ends hvor det er helt tydelig hva du skal gjøre, men for å gjøre det må du gjennom en del. Du kommer etter hvert fram til et tre med en kombinasjonlås. Jeg måtte søke på nettet for å finne koden, så jeg bare forteller deg koden: "Left-Right-Right". 
Dette spillet er ikke vanskelig i det heletatt, alt du må bruke er musa. Det er bare veldig tidkrevende. På en hel time hadde jeg bare kommet halveis og da har jeg lest teksten grundig. 25929481.review:
I'm really not sure how I'd rate this game.  Wait!  Let me start over!

I loved playing this game.  It was awesome.  And at a price of... free... it's well worth at least checking out.

That said, I honestly can't think of a price above free that would leave me feeling any affection for this game.  The art is... bare bones, the storytelling minimal, and the mechanics simple.  This is the type of thing that I could code in Ren'Py in a day or two, with minimal chance for review.  And yet, even with all that said, it's put together so well that I can't help but feel that this is actually a very professional piece of work.

And it passes my main test.  It was fun.  I didn't play it long.  The amount you see, around 1.3 hours, is the amount of time you need to complete it, and hunt down all remaining acheivements.  But during that time I had a great experience.

So... this... is my thumb up!

25928937.review: Cool little game. I recommend everyone playing it. Especially achievement hunters.

25928824.review:
Disturbed is a choose-your-own-adventure visual novel from Brad Moore. Let’s get rocking.

The Good

How many games do you get for free? There you go; pro number one for this game.

This game has 17 achievements and they couldn’t be easier to get. Just die. Die a lot and in various ways.

The atmosphere is great and the setting is most intriguing.

The Bad

It always pains me to complain about free games, because they’re free and I’m sure the developer put a lot of work into them. See the below section for me criticisms.

The Meh

The art in the game can be a little hit and miss, but, when it’s on point, it is really good.

The sounds, while good, are much to sparse.

I feel as though the setting is being held back from it’s full potential due to the simplistic nature of the game.

Verdict: Yea

It’s a free game. It’s a good game considering that it’s free. Look Disturbed up in the Steam Store if you have nothing better going on.

As a fan of the heavy metal band I was pretty disappointed at the lack of gameplay videos for this title - at least for the first 3 or so days since its release.

Disturbed is a nice point'n'click game although it doesn't get anywhere above average. Trial and error is a mandatory thing for this genre yet if you take it too far the weigh of the choices will be irrelevant. I think the death-based achievements only encourage that.

There's nothing much to say about this title, really. It's worth a try for the sole purpose of being a decent game and for the fact that it also includes the ability of saving - too many titles failed to deliver that. Yet I still wonder...why are there so many saves? Like, I understand, but ~100? What the hell is this for?

This is a very simple "choose your adventure" style game, and it only took 3.5 hours to get all the achievements.

That said, this is the first time since I was a kid playing my NES that a game made me take out a note pad and start making detailed notes of what I did so I can figure out where I went wrong for when I'd inevitably have to load a save up because I had gotten killed.

Even with 100% of the achievements, it still feels like there may be some areas of the game that can be explored, and I'm actually looking forward to trying to find a way to those areas.  The simplicity of this game greatly lends to it's brooding and hopeless aptmosphere.  Definitly a game that's worth playing, being a free title, you have no good reason not to try it.

25874999.review:
Meh, if you've ever read a Choose Your Own Adventure book, this is sort of like that. Interactive novel with readable text, uninspired yet good enough ambient sounds, and some neat drawings that are reminiscent of the Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark illustrations. Are there better interactive novels out there? Sure. Can you beat the price? Absolutely not. Don't get frustrated at the nonsensical deaths. While they seem to add nothing and come out of nowhere, if you're an achievement hunter you'll want to get them all. 

It'll burn an hour of your time for free, I can't complain. I won't tell anybody about it either, though. If ever there was a need for a 'maybe' selection in the 'Do you recommend this game?' section, this would be it. I'll recommend it though, because hey, it works, which is sometimes not the case for games you pay for.

25874817.review:
So I could give positive review, but I got feeling that there are enough positive reviews already for existing problems.

There are at least one positive side: you can get all achievements in hour or less. But this also gives shock when you will find out that out of 17 achievements 16 requires your death in certain place. This makes death not punishment, but reward, which destroyed large part of enjoyment for me.

But even if you don't care about achievements and try to complete game without deaths in first run there are not enough hints to avoid deaths. For example when you choose to sleep on grass or on tree, when you sleep on grass tree kills you and sleeping on that tree seems fine. Or when you just choose direction: some path will lead to unavoidable death, but nobody gives you hints about that. Could be: "you hear growling from middle door", "you see glowing eyes in middle tunnel", "you see some movement under water", or something like that. Journals are absolutely useless, since they have only meaningless information.

You are farmer in dark fantasy setting, but you can read and write.(okay, stereotypes)

I got little enjoyment because there are lack of ability to lose. I can't count death as lose condition because of reward for such actions, lack of leads to avoid deaths and punishment for completing game without dying(you will get only 1 achievement).

It's text based so you do need to pay attention to what you are reading and doing. In this game you should save often because you will die and have to start over again. It's not bad for a free game, it's not really horror but it is fun. Try it, it's free. 7/10

25861617.review:
Personally not for me. I'm mainly rating this down because there is no in-between voting choice AND there are irritating joke positives.

It's not a terrible game, especially because it's free. I can read the text perfectly, the sound effects are amusing, and the artwork has a certain charm to it. 

I'm personally not a fan of 'how many ways can I die' choose-your-own-adventures. While the deaths can be kinda funny [spoiler]omigawsh don't do the 'shrooms, dudes[/spoiler] they kind of put me off wanting to work out whatever is wrong with the farm. While the journal and strange discovery in the pen are mildly intriguing, I don't have long enough before I have to reload a save. It breaks my flow and it isn't what I'm looking for in a VN. Having said that, there's no reason that sadomasochists of a different bent than I won't enjoy it. 

4 - 5 out of 10 from me at the moment. Because I didn't feel enough of a hook to play for longer than I did, this might be my only input. I'll attempt to return to give a more balance look. 

Steam, please give people a joke review option. One more [i]Down With The Sickness[/i] joke and I think I might go french kiss [spoiler] the bear in the cave[/spoiler] or [spoiler]the dead cow with the killer 'shrooms growing round it[/spoiler].

25856006.review:
È un'avventura grafica dalla pessima componente narrativa. Il gioco si compone di lunghe descrizioni di sensazioni, che occupano gran parte delle sensazioni narrate. Lo sviluppatore avrebbe dovuto preferire creare immagini ed ambientazioni rialmente inquientati, piuttosto che tentare di suggerire al giocatore cosa provare. La serie di scelte che compone l'altra metà del gameplay risulta davvero superficiale: ci si ritrova quasi in ogni caso a leggere profonde descrizioni del nostro battito cardiaco che si altera e di immagini che dovrebbero esserre inquietanti o a leggere di come siamo morti in modi patetici.
Purtroppo il gioco non da nulla di quello che lo sviluppatore si era messo in testa di trasmettere; un tentativo fallito.
Giocatelo per capire come non dovrebbe essere fatta un'avventura grafica. Non è uno scherzo, lo consiglio sul serio: è un esperimento fallito di un programmatore, dai suoi sbagli si può imparare.

25854943.review:
成就喜加一  Disturbed，又一款免费的指点解谜游戏。主要剧情讲述了主角是一个农民，然而他看到自己的庄园越来越差，草地荒芜，决定去探求原因。。。。。之后发现一个秘密的故事。其实剧情比较俗套，流程也比较短，整体解密部分也不太多，全程没有BGM只有音效，但是画风个人感觉不错，比较喜欢这种铅笔素描的黑白风格。又是一个免费游戏，已经很不错了。路线也并不复杂基本就是各处调查，多存盘就行 分岔路左中右都走走就行  成就也不是很难，一共17个，其中15个[spoiler] 是和死有关，也就是说你各处调查，会遇到各种死法，比如一开始被山洞里的熊打死 探索废屋，进入地窖，解救妇女结果被装扮的女鬼弄死 探索自家pen拿蘑菇被毒死，被城堡内的蜘蛛，鬣狗咬死等等[/spoiler]  剩下的两个则是[spoiler] 完美结局。。。。 也就是最终消灭塔顶的雕像 区别就是一个是借助独角兽（消灭之后独角兽会来救你） 另一个是只用亡灵游侠的石中剑而不惊动独角兽 [/spoiler]  

建议英语不错的自己玩玩 我两个多小时下来只剩一个成就  还能学到一些GRE单词比如 apparition， trickle， vicious, harp等等   
= =  

再说一下一些关键的部分 
1.第一处树洞解密 这里进去之后是游戏的主要部分 各种关键道具都要用在这里或在这里找到 树洞是有左右中三个knot  需要一共敲击三次才能进入[spoiler] 调查附近左右两个雕像就行 左边的是point one finger in the sky, 右边的是 he is protecting the bowl and ......only has two fingers. 很明白了吧 左边的knot敲一次 右边的敲二次 中间的不用管就能进去了[/spoiler] 

2.石中剑处是这个游戏的第二个关键 基本可以对付游戏中的所有生物 [spoiler]（包括水里的怪鱼 杀死能得到orb 关键道具;  洞里的蜘蛛精 杀死会得到钥匙 之后开启顶楼的宝箱获得ring 另外的重要道具 将orb放置在石柱群上 可以激发戒指的魔力从而对抗最终那个雕像） 但你要帮助亡灵游侠的灵魂释放才会得到这把剑 [/spoiler]   [spoiler]在城堡中你会找到一朵花（就是在最右边洞穴 之后往右走 应该是）就可以释放他的灵魂从而得到石中剑 此外游戏中在破船上还会得到一把小刀 它也很有用 是用来对付那个触手怪的。其他的生物都无效[/spoiler] 

3.独角兽、猎狗 在游戏中石柱之后的场景你会遇到一只unicorn 但是他会马上消失 为啥呢 在监狱里你会遇到一只猎犬 可是即便石中剑也不能杀死他 为啥呢   [spoiler]如果你来到山洞中的某个藏书处，会有三个选项，其中两个选项是两本书，一本是harp and..... 其中会提到 when hearing the sound of the harp, those shy and vicious animals will become calm......大意是这样 线索就在此 因为独角兽很害羞，猎狗很凶残，但当他们听到竖琴的声音之后就会变得非常平静。 用石中剑杀死蜘蛛精后就会得到一把钥匙，用它打开有地球仪屋子的箱子后就会得到竖琴拉 而独角兽是你的好帮手 其中一个成就就是借助独角兽的力量消灭最后的雕像 游戏结束后你会从塔顶跌下 这时候他会来救你 这只独角兽画的还是很漂亮的有没有 [/spoiler]

总之游戏整体还是尚可的 作为免费游戏。。。。国庆期间闲着解解密谜，读读英语 成就喜加一   三赢！！

25854178.review: Quite a nice concept, while it is not a impressive game it is fun and worth playing.

25853888.review: This game reminded me of the NES game Uninvited, with its plentiful and often unexpected/entertaining death scenarios, but Disturbed was more of a compilation of said death scenarios with some simple puzzles in between (and a much more forgiving save system). I had fun finding all the different ways to die and gradually making my way to the ending during the couple hours I played. The minimalism of the artwork and sound contributed to the sour, depressing atmosphere of the game. The writing seemed a bit thrown together, typos and all. Still, it's a fun free game, and I'd recommend it if you've got a bit of time to spare.

25853698.review:
This game is not for everyone, obviously, but it is rather interesting. Minutes after I installed the game, recalling a game called "A Dark Room" and thinking that this game might be simmilar, I opened the game and immediately got sucked in by the simple and yet creative art style and dark atomsphere of the game.
In this story, as written in the description, you will assume the role of a farmer that is a rather average man trying to make his living out of his farm which has become the victim of a plague that attacked the land. From this point, what happenes is completely up to you. You will be have to choose what to do from the very beggining. 
You'll probably die though, more than once, but it's all worth it. 
Another thing that adds to the atmosphere of the game is the minimal sound effects. While you can't say that this game is loud or that it has an amazing soundtrack you can definitely say that the sounds effects give from time to time a chilling sensation.
There are two things that have bothered me, though: The UI- which isnt too complicated to use but could be more convenient- and the font of the text in the game- something which is really not a deal breaker but just felt a bit too casual to me.
However, these disadvantages take very little away from the thrilling expirence that this short game offers you for no price at all.
One last thing I'd like to point out is that a person could play this game even if he can't read as there is an option for a self-voicing mode. :D

25851705.review:
The spoilers are covered in black. Finish the game before reading them.
Worth every cent (jk) 

It was fun, but shortlived, I managed to get all the achievements pretty easily. Though in my own stupidity I managed to make the game last far longer than it really needed to be. [spoiler]I never got the coin in my first successful run, so to enter the tower I repeatedly went through the caverns. [/spoiler] 

It was good writing and amazing artwork for a free game, easily could be converted directly into a "choose your own path" style book.

A few areas that could be expanded on: [spoiler] How the ship ended up a shipwreck, perhaps a use for the oven,  the second passageway in the cells, what happened to the town, and a deeper background to the magic behind the place, and perhaps a better detailed ending  (The good one) [/spoiler] 

But overral it's free, about an hour of your time, and slightly intriguing, you can't lose.

25850379.review:
If you like "Choose your own adventure" stories and "FREE" and you are not a picky brat, then you may like this one. 

Pros:

+ It's Free
+ So far, no bugs found
+ Easy Achievements, most of them deaths :D and I got them in one seat.
+ Save your progress at any point so you can satisfy your curiosity with " what would happen if I choose..."
+ Low system requirements for wood PC's 
+ Fast download for shitty internet connections
+ It has some sound effects, and for a free game they are not 8 bit! The creepy woman laughing was very good indeed 
+ Super easy idiot-proof controllers! I was able to play this while hungry and half asleep


Neutral

*Graphics are simple in black and white, but well done..


Cons (but not that bad)

- Short 
- The tags include "Horror"... probably for kids. There are no jumpscares or anything too gory.
- Complex story and explanations for every mystery... are not here. If you are that kind of player who cannot live without them please stay away
- Some decisions lack logic and fall into "trial and error" luck.
- Not replay value once you get all the achievements. 



I still want to see if there is something you can do with the odd carved statue on the stairs (the one that looks like Virgin Mary praying)  If any of you know please tell me in the comments


And finally, take in consideration this game is free, and I mean, really free: no microtransactions, no dlc's, no bullshit.

25846204.review:
Mostly a trial and error game.  Click and hope your choice doesn't kill you.  Reload and chose another.  That's the game.  

It doesn't follow a very logical flow, nor does it give the player a decent way to reason through it.  For example, early on you're given a choice to lay in bed.  Doing so is fatal.  However, a little ways further you're given the forced choice of "take a nap by the tree outside" or "pick the grass".  Well, if sleeping in bed kills me, why would I sleep outside where the dangers are more likely to be with a plague?  So pick the grass to stay entertained while resting.  No. The tree kills you.  You were supposed to take a nap...by the tree that kills you.

25845396.review:
I am reminded of the old Choose Your Own Adventures where part of the fun was finding out what new and strange way you will die next.  Artwork is fine, sounds are a little strange at times, and the occasional journal or book is interesting, but I've already gotten almost all the endings under half an hour.

Not bad but you can blitz through the game rather quickly.  Not as much content compared to some other free VNs (though plenty more compared to others) but since it is a spooky adventure rather than yet another dating sim or a school/raising sim makes it stand out in my eyes.

I recommend taking this for a spin.

25845274.review:
Disturbed is a fairly short visual novel that takes on a slight horror atmosphere. You play as a farmer in a decaying land that is cursed by a spreading plague which is wiping out not only crops, but livestock as well. You will need to proceed through the story, solve a few small puzzles, and return the land to its once inhabitable form. The title uses the Ren'py Engine, which is the current standard for most visual novel games, so if you've played any previously the interface will be familiar to you.

I'm going to say right off the bat that the story here is lacking pretty severely; there's nothing interesting or fun about being a depressed farmer who wants to restore the fertility of his land. With that being said, where Disturbed really excels is its dark atmosphere, morose mood, and raw graphics. All of the scenes are hand drawn in black and white, and honestly they look completely untouched by Photoshop or other image editing software; rather they look like they went straight from the paper to the scanner, in to the game. Another fun thing to do in this title is to find out all of the ways that you can possibly die, and there are about a dozen different ways.

Another lacking feature here is the audio. You can play for minutes at a time without hearing anything whatsoever, and music is virtually nonexistent. The only sounds are the ones that indicate when you're on a death screen, and effects such as doors shutting or keys jingling. Even just a slight dark ambient soundtrack would suffice, it certainly wouldn't take away from the corroded atmosphere of the game; in fact, it would enhance it. Most players get mind-numbingly bored without any background audio to listen to. There are also quite a few spelling and grammatical errors throughout the dialogue, but some of these have been patched out.

So you may be wondering why I'm recommending Disturbed even though I listed off more cons than pros. Simply put, the game has an impenetrable depressive atmosphere that should be experienced by any horror and black metal fans. It's also easy to tell that a lot of time and passion went in to drawing all of the scenes, and there are quite a lot of them. Disturbed is best saved for a rainy fall day, when you have an hour or two to kill (or to be killed).

[h1]Rating: [b]3.0/5.0[/b] - Average, can take it or leave it.[/h1]

25843587.review:
This a hard game to complain about - especially for the price of zero dollars and zero cents - but it's also a hard one to rave about.

   The images are crude and only sporadically charming, the sound is solid but sparse, the writing is passable yet mostly uninspired (though occasionally witty), and the deaths are often cheap and arbitrary. On the plus side, the setting is quite intriguing - you never can have too much pestilence in a fantasy world! - and the Achievements come thick and fast and are amusing enough at times. 

   It's also an appropriately short and not overly ambitious project (over-ambition being the undoing of many a newbie dev, in my opinion). All in all, while this is no great shakes in and of itself, I do look forward to whatever this Brad Moore fellow gets up to in future, as there's no denying the potential shown here. (Though I wouldn't mind seeing his rough sketches elaborated into more aesthetically complete images in future). 

Verdict: 6.5/10.

25843063.review:
Eine tolle Beschreibung eines Spieles: ,,Inspiriert aus Erfahrungen der Depression und des Entzuges." Ersteres ist meines erachtens nach nichts besonderes, seien wir ehrlich, in der modernen Zeit sind viele Depressiv gerade unser Volk ist davon betroffen da der deutsche zu einer gewissen melancholie neigt. Die Gründe sind bei vielen verschieden sei es nun der Arbeitsmarkt, das Geld, die Wohnung das persönliche Umfeld etc. Zweiteres mag zwar interessant sein aber im Spiel merkt man nichts davon. Von der Story her erinnert es mich an Dark Souls und andere dunkle angehauchte Fantasy.

Es hat nette Bleistift Zeichnungen mit einer...naja eher 08/15 Story ist aber deshalb nicht schlecht. Man klickt sich munter durch die jeweiligen Szenen versucht Gegenstände zufinden und stirbt nebenbei ein paar mal. So wie in Dark Souls. Am Anfang stirbt man um die 3-5 Mal bis man den Dreh rausfindet. Man sammelt Gegenstände ein aber man muss sie sich merken da man kein Inventar besitzt.

Horror würde ich es nicht nennen dafür war es eher zu minimalistisch aufgebaut was jetzt aber keine negative Beurteilung sein sollte.

Für den Preis (gratis), den Anforderung und dem Genre ist dieses Spiel gelungen und ein netter Zeitvertreib. Man ist gut 30 bis 60 Minuten lang beschäftigt. Ladet es einfach runter und bildet euch selbst ein Urteil ob es gut oder schlecht ist.

39578626.review:
I used to have these game novels in my youth where I, myself, assumed the role of the protagonist. On page 5 I met a knight who offered me some quests. I had to pick one. If I chose quest number 1 my journey continued on page 39. In case a preferred quest number 2 I had to go to page number 24. These so-called "Choose Your Own Adventure" novels allowed you to make decisions and, interestingly, there were a lot of bad decisions along the way. By picking these you immediately died and had to start over.

Now, Disturbed follows this concept. You make decisions and often die (dying is important to gather some of the achievements) so your best bet is to take notes so that next time you will not be making the same error. 

Disturbed is basically a text-based adventure game with lots of hand-drawn, black and white images and it has an atmosphere that the title very well describes. Simplicity means no music and sound effects are only heard here and there, plus, there are some typos but the game can also be played in other languages. On the plus side, the game offers several endings.

It is a short adventure, free, and easy to obtain all achievements. I understand Brad Moore is currently developing the sequel. It will be a must-play for me but, hopefully, the journey will be a little longer this time.

39513554.review:
Disturbed est un jeu du type "Roman dont vous êtes le héros" (à plutôt considérer comme un RPG textuel illustré), dans lequel vous incarnerez un fermier dont les récoltes sont victimes d'une malédiction et qui en conséquent décide de partir à l'aventure en quête de réponse sur ce terrible évènement. Au cours de votre périple vous allez devoir avancer dans le jeu en faisant des choix qui vous feront soit progresser vers votre objectif, soit évoluer vers une mort toujours plus ou moins atroce (il vous faudra d'ailleurs trouver toutes les façons de mourrir si vous souhaitez acquérir tous les succès Steam du jeu. Oui, ce jeu est très gai ^^).

Points positifs:
- Une histoire plutôt prenante qui donne envie de rusher le jeu.
- Des "énigmes" qui vous obligeront à souvent revenir en arrière pour déverrouiller des passages à la manière d'un "point & click".
- Bande son plutôt réussie composée de petits bruitages rythmant la lecture du récit.
- Une traduction dans beaucoup de langues! C'est rare dans des jeux du genre. Pour la partie française, en tout cas, c'est carrément réussi (même si deux ou trois boîtes de dialogue ont été oubliées lors de la traduction et sont donc restées en anglais on peut laisser couler ce détail qui n'est pas dérangeant).

Points négatifs:
- Manque un poil de bande son musicale (même si le silence permet de mettre en valeur la partie bruitage, la musique pourrait mettre en place des suspenses qui sont, du coup, non présent. C'est dommage. 
- Le jeu est un peu court, nous faisant alors progresser dans un univers dont on n'a au final que peu de réponse. De plus, certains éléments scénaristiques ont une présence inexpliquée au sein du jeu ( c'est pour cette raison qu'il faut prendre ce jeu comme un RPG textuel dans lequel on avance en faisant des choix plutôt que comme un roman interactif.).

Pour conclure, Disturbed est un petit RPG textuel qui vous occupera probablement pendant une petite paire d'heure si vous cherchez à accomplir toutes les fins possibles. Le jeu reste sympa dans son ensemble; il vous donnera envie de toujours aller plus loin jusqu'à ce que finalement vous vous rendiez compte que vous l'avez fini d'une traite! Cependant on peut rester sur notre fin une fois le jeu terminé car peu d'éléments scénaristiques ont de réponses concrètes. Je recommande tout de même ce jeu pour le bon moment que j'ai passé en y jouant. De plus, le jeu est gratuit et un DLC de support est disponible pour encourager le développeur en lui faisant un don d'un euro (très belle mentalité de sa part).

39797564.review:
Un jeu sympathique et gratuit, à voir comme un mini-"livre dont vous êtes le héros" amateur.
Le personnage évolue de scène en scène selon les choix d'actions/directions que vous ferez pour lui.

J'avais la crainte que les visuels dessinés au crayon me démotivent, mais ils s'associent finalement très bien avec l'atmosphère lugubre et sont accompagnés d'une ambiance sonore simple et dramatique.
L'ensemble est en accord avec l'histoire de cette terre subitement maudite pour de mystérieuses raisons.

On meurt souvent mais dans des circonstances bien précises, donc facilement évitables par la suite. La mort n'est guère gênante dans la mesure où l'aventure est courte et qu'il est possible de sauvegarder à tout moment.
Les causes de décès sont variées et il était devenu amusant de chercher tous les moyens de passer l'arme à gauche.

Autrefois lecteur assidu de ce type de "livres-jeux", j'ai retrouvé avec plaisir de vieux réflexes et la solution au problème m'a paru accessible.

Même si la meilleure des fins apporte une conclusion satisfaisante à l'aventure, elle ne donne pas toutes les réponses aux nombreux petits mystères rencontrés au fil du jeu.

Il est possible de faire l'acquisition d'un DLC à 0.99 €, qui fait office de petit support financier au créateur et permet d'obtenir le jeu dans sa bibliothèque Steam.

P.S. : encore merci à Mia pour la traduction française.

39661289.review:
[h1]8/10[/h1]
Нарушеныый - визуальная новелла про фермера противостоящего мистическкой чуме. Мир открытый. Фермер может возвращатся почти из всех развилок, если не погибнет. Существуют два типа новел: 1) романтические и 2) на выживание. Эта новелла относится к типу на выживание. Твой выбор влияет на то, погибнешь ты или продолжишь свое путешествие.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
+ Открытый мир. Можно ходить практически везде. Везде есть выриант вернутся назад по дороге. Следовательно можно (и нужно) пройти некоторые локации дважды с разными вещами.
+ Загадки средней сложности. Если внимательно читать и смотеть на картинки, то можно их решить без гугла.
+ Русский язык. Не маловажно в чтении новеллы.
+ Достижения. Для любителей идеальной игры.

[h1]Минусы: [/h1] 
- Не смотря на открытый мир, прохождение линейное. Сделать петлю по миру и разрушить кристалл. Хотелось бы несколько вариантов положительных концовок. Потенциал есть. Мир открытый, его можно расширить....
- Короткая. Внимательно читая новеллу и изучая все возможные варианты событий у меня прохождение заняло около часа. Второй раз в неё играть врядли захочется. Но этот Час был отличным. Спасибо.
